txt.en: 'Alas the local Party Planning Committee has rejected my request. It looks as if I will need to plead my case in person at our next Shire-wide Party Planning Committee monthly meeting.'

'Enough, is enough, [placeholder]. I have endured my share of nights disturbed by dreams of papers on ribbons, dangling from trees, of tearing my hair out puzzling over lists upon lists upon lists, of wondering - nay knowing how folks must snicker at me and this this this ridiculous prank behind my back!\n\n'I have placed a request with the Party Planning Committee to be relieved of my post. Perhaps I can learn to help with the assembly of kites or the baking of pies. Really, anything to get away from this tree!'
The Eriador Anniversary Scavenger Hunt -- Year Seven
Complete an Eriador Year Seven scavenger hunt card for a reward!

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.

<rgb=#00FF00> This version of the quest includes only objectives found within Eriador and is available to players of all levels. </rgb>

<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace. When you complete a scavenger hunt, bring the completed card to Odilia Rumble for a reward!
Odilia Rumble can be found next to the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should speak to Odilia Rumble to receive your reward for completing a scavenger hunt card!
